course_description: This course will familiarize students with a variety of methods for current applications of quantum and classical mechanics to problems in chemistry and chemical physics. A significant portion of Revised 11/29/2018 2 the course will focus on the numerical methods and software used in real applications and topics will range from electronic structure of "small molecules" to the molecular dynamics and molecular vibrations using empirical force fields.
sections: Class Nbr: 2886, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4:20-5:35p, Instructor: F. Evangelista, Status: Open
